root.title: Text Input
root.scenario:
This page type allows the learner to input text which gets stored between sessions. You can add a model answer to the feedback section for the learner to compare notes with on submission.

The text input here will get stored in the My Notes panel for later reference and is available to print out.

question.text: Here you can prefix the text area input with a question
Or it might have more detailed information about what you want the learner to write

item.text:
Here you might put a model answer for the learner to compare notes with.

Check the My Notes panel by selecting the tab on the bottom left.
